detail_desc: Boots in imitation patent leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Boots in imitation patent leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles, and patterned soles.

Warm-lined boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Soft velour linings and insoles and chunky soles. Height of soles 3.5 cm.

Warm-lined boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Soft velour linings and insoles and chunky soles. Height of soles 3.5 cm.

Ankle boots in imitation suede made from partly recycled polyester. Zip in one side with a star-shaped tab. Linings and insoles in fabric made from recycled polyester. Small heels and patterned soles.

High biker boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side and an adjustable tab over the foot with a metal buckle. Linings and insoles in warm fleece. Chunky soles that are patterned underneath. Heel 3.8 cm.

Top in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a collar and rhinestone-decorated buttons at the top. Gently dropped shoulders, short sleeves with ribbed trims and a ribbed hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Top in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a collar and rhinestone-decorated buttons at the top. Gently dropped shoulders, short sleeves with ribbed trims and a ribbed hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Top in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a collar and rhinestone-decorated buttons at the top. Gently dropped shoulders, short sleeves with ribbed trims and a ribbed hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Fitted vest top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a twisted racer back.

Cardigan in a soft cable knit containing some wool. Boxy fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Buttons down the front. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.

Cardigan in a soft cable knit containing some wool. Boxy fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Buttons down the front. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Boxy polo-neck jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long, slightly wider sleeves and ribbing at cuffs.
Boxy polo-neck jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long, slightly wider sleeves and ribbing at cuffs.

Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool. Boxy fit with a deep V-neck, rhinestone-decorated buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.

Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool. Boxy fit with a deep V-neck, rhinestone-decorated buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back. The polyamide content of the briefs is partly recycled.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back. The polyamide content of the briefs is partly recycled.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back. The polyamide content of the briefs is partly recycled.

Straight-cut, calf-length shirt dress in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides of the hem. Unlined. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.
Boxy jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a V-neck at the front, small V-neck at the back and long sleeves that narrow to the cuffs.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline, button placket and press-studs at the crotch.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline, button placket and press-studs at the crotch.
Shirt in washed denim with a collar, yoke front and back, pearly press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shirt in washed denim with a collar, yoke front and back, pearly press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a text print on the chest. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and pockets in the side seams.
Short T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a text print on the chest. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and pockets in the side seams.
Short T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a text print on the chest. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and pockets in the side seams.
Short T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a text print on the chest. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and pockets in the side seams.

Short dress in soft cotton denim with a gently tapered waist. Collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Discreet pockets in the side seams, and a rounded hem. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.

Short dress in soft cotton denim with a gently tapered waist. Collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Discreet pockets in the side seams, and a rounded hem. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.

Warm-lined hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded top edge. Hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted soles. Height of soles 2 cm.

Warm-lined hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded top edge. Hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted soles. Height of soles 2 cm.

Warm-lined hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded top edge. Hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted soles. Height of soles 2 cm.

Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved romper suit in airy, organic cotton poplin. Lined at the top, buttons at the back and gathered seams front and back. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and around the legs and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved dress in a fine knit with a polo neck, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.
Relaxed-fit joggers in soft denim. Casual style with a gathered, easy pull-on, elasticated waist. Fake fly and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Wide, double-breasted jacket in felted fabric containing some wool with notch lapels, flap front pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Lined.
Soft, non-wired bras in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.

Fully lined tankini top with a wrapover top section and gently draped front for best fit over the tummy. Padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support, adjustable shoulder straps and concealed elastication under the bust for added support. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.

Nursing jumper in an airy, fine knit with a unique nursing feature, round neck and long sleeves. Inner top in jersey with a woven lower section. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Soft faux fur linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a gentle V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a gentle V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Relaxed-fit jumper in a soft knit with a stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in a soft weave with a V-neck, wide shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, diagonal side pockets and long, wide legs.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in a soft weave with a V-neck, wide shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, diagonal side pockets and long, wide legs.
Relaxed-fit polo-neck jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Relaxed-fit polo-neck jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Relaxed-fit polo-neck jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Flared leggings in jersey. High waist with covered elastication, and a slit at the hems.
Flared leggings in jersey. High waist with covered elastication, and a slit at the hems.
Fitted jacket in a textured bouclé weave containing some wool. V-neck with one metal button at the front. Lined. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.

Short dress in an airy, textured weave with a wrapover top and an open back with wide ties at the back of the neck. Short, voluminous puff sleeves with covered elastication at the hems, and a gathered seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back. Lined.

Short dress in an airy, textured weave with a wrapover top and an open back with wide ties at the back of the neck. Short, voluminous puff sleeves with covered elastication at the hems, and a gathered seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back. Lined.
Knee-length dress in satin with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a deeper neckline at the back, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a sheen. Spaghetti shoulder straps, a draped V-neck and a drawstring at the sides.
Short, fitted skirt in a jacquard weave with a high waist, concealed zip and a small slit at the back. The polyester content of the skirt is partly recycled.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy viscose weave with a frill trim at the top and wide, tie-top shoulder straps. Seam with covered elastication at the waist, pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy viscose weave with a frill trim at the top and wide, tie-top shoulder straps. Seam with covered elastication at the waist, pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Soft faux fur linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Ribbed leggings with soft elastication at the waist.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Ribbed leggings with soft elastication at the waist.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Ribbed leggings with soft elastication at the waist.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Ribbed leggings with soft elastication at the waist.
Playsuit in a patterned viscose weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top and tie-top shoulder straps. Seam and covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and short, wide legs.
Signet rings in various designs made from recycled zinc.
Signet rings in various designs made from recycled zinc.

Oversized jacket in washed, sturdy denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke and fake pockets with a flap and button at the top and diagonal welt front pockets. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and covered elastication at the back of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs, two with a pendant.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs, two with a pendant.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a square neckline front and back and an integral sports bra with a double-layered front and elasticated hem.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a square neckline front and back and an integral sports bra with a double-layered front and elasticated hem.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a ribbed trim around the neckline.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a ribbed trim around the neckline.

Wide dress in airy, lightly crinkled chiffon with a round neckline and small opening with a concealed button at the top. Long, wide sleeves with wide cuffs, and a voluminous skirt with gathered tiers. V-neck underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Baby Exclusive. Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a slight sheen made from recycled polyester. Front pockets, press-studs down the front and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Cap in cotton denim with an embroidered motif on the front and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.

Baby Exclusive. Down jacket in a recycled polyester weave with a filling of 80% recycled down and 20% feathers. Detachable hood, a zip down the front with a chin guard and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit bamboo blend with wide elastication at the tops.
